mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(qna_no) AS totalItems FROM QNA AS q INNER JOIN MEMBER AS m ON q.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS a ON q.answer_no = a.member_no

SELECT qna_no AS qnaNo, qst_title AS qstTitle, qst_contents AS qstContents, regist_date AS registDate, state, answer_no AS answerNo, answer_name AS answerName, answer_date AS answerDate, member_no AS memberNo, member_name AS memberName, role_name AS roleName FROM ( SELECT @no:=@no+1 as rn, qna_no, qst_title, qst_contents, regist_date, state, answer_date, answer_no, answer_name, member_no, member_name, role_name FROM ( SELECT qna_no, qst_title, qst_contents, regist_date, q.state, answer_date, q.answer_no, a.member_name AS answer_name, q.member_no, m.member_name, m.role_name FROM QNA AS q INNER JOIN MEMBER AS m ON q.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS a ON q.answer_no = a.member_no
ORDER BY qna_no DESC ) QNA, (Select @no:=0) AS no ) AS QNA WHERE rn between #{page.startIndex} AND #{page.endIndex}

SELECT qst_title AS qstTitle, qst_contents AS qstContents, alram_type AS alramType, regist_date AS registDate, q.state, answer, answer_date AS answerDate, q.answer_no AS answerNo, a.member_name AS answerName, q.member_no AS memberNo, m.member_name AS memberName, m.role_name AS roleName, m.email AS alramEmail, m.phone AS alramPhone FROM QNA AS q INNER JOIN MEMBER AS m ON q.member_no = m.member_no LEFT JOIN MEMBER AS a ON q.answer_no = a.member_no WHERE qna_no = #{no}
